Posts.Content: Jan 27, 2013 08:57AM brittany12 wrote: Thats great news! I had 3 fibroadinoma's in my left breast and after they did the biopsy the 1 of 3 masses went haywire and grew in size and began to hurt really bad. They decided for me to go ahead and get it removed. I had surgery last week, and the surgeon missed my mass :( and im still in pain... ive been reading and I read that once the mass has been messed with or "air" gets to it, it grows, or cells grow.. now it has been messed with twice with in a month in a half... I just dont know where to go from here...
Posts.Title: Results are in - BENIGN! rhodeeho brittany12

Posts.Content: Jan 27, 2013 05:18PM brittany12 wrote: I am 24 years old and they have found 3 fibroadenoma's in my left breast. After my biposy, My Mass GREW and went haywire and hurt SO BAD!! They decided for me to have it surgically removed. I had my surgery last Tuesday. When the surgeon went in to cut out the mass, it moved, and so he missed it... So i still have pain under my arm, and sometimes sharp pains. I dont know where to go from this point...
